related_questions.question:
Present Continuous    1.My Son (Talk) On The Phone Right Now.

 2.(You/Sleep)?

 3.Jason (Do) His Homework At The Moment.

 4.Tom (Work) On A Project Now A Days.

 5.My Kids (Play) In The Garden Now.

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

1. My son is talking on the phone right now.

2. Are you sleeping?

3. Jason is doing his homework at the moment.

4. Tom is working on a project nowadays.

5. My kids are playing in the garden now.

Penjelasan:

Present continuous = used to describe an activity that is now happening/ongoing = digunakan untuk menjelaskan kegiatan/aktivitas yang sekarang sedang terjadi

Rules:

(+) I + AM + (verb)-ing.

(-) I + AM not + (verb)-ing.

(?) AM + I + (verb)-ing?

(+) You/we/they/(+2 people/objects) + ARE + (verb)-ing.

(-) You/we/they/(+2 people/objects) + ARE not + (verb)-ing.

(?) ARE + You/we/they/(+2 people/objects) + (verb)-ing?

(+) He/she/it/(1 person/object) + IS + (verb)-ing.

(-) He/she/it/(1 person/object) + IS not + (verb)-ing.

(?) IS + He/she/it/(1 person/object) + (verb)-ing?

(1) Son = 1 person, use "is talking"

(2) You, use "are you sleeping?"

(3) Jason = 1 person, use "is doing"

(4) Tom = 1 person, use "is working"

(5) Kids = 2 people, use "are playing"

- 嘉誠 -

Jawaban:

  1. My son is talking on the phone right now
  2. are you sleeping?
  3. Jason is doing his homework at the moment
  4. Tom is working on a project nowadays
  5. My kids are playing in the garden now

Penjelasan:

rumus present continuous:

Subject + To be (is/am/are) + verb-ing + object

  • (-) subject + to be + not + verb ing + object
  • (?) to be + subject + verb ing + object

semoga membantu :)

-潘佳妮-

related_questions.question:
Dalam perekonomian yang ada di Indonesia ada istilah ekspor dan impor hal tersebut adalah istilah perdagangan yang dilakukan antar    A.daerah

B.Negara

C.kabupaten

D.kecamatan​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

A. Daerah

Penjelasan:

1. Contoh, ada pabrik yang mengekspor sebuah barang atau dagangan ke negara lain seperti Kalimantan .

2. Daerah Jogja mengimpor dagangannya ke Jakarta

Semoga membantu!

Terima kasih yaa!

Yogya no. 1!

Soal :

Dalam perekonomian yang ada di Indonesia ada istilah ekspor dan impor hal tersebut adalah istilah perdagangan yang dilakukan antar

Jawaban :

A. Daerah

Penjelasan :

Istilah ekspor impor merupakan transaksi perdagangan internasional (international trade) atau bisnis internasional (international business)

Answer by : Khairaaqueenapurba

related_questions.question:
ID sual 10 - 25!    My name is Calista Antartike. Just call me Calista My school is SD Pandemi. I am the student of the
fifth class. I will tell about professions that I can find at my school. There are headmaster, teachers, a
librarian, school staffs, and a gardener
Headmaster is the person who leads a school. Teachers are person who teach the students. Librar
is a person who works in a library. School staffs are persons who take care of the school's administration
and a gardener is a person who takes care of the school garden. artikan ke bahasa Indonesia ​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

Nama saya Calista Antartike. Panggil saja saya Calista Sekolah saya adalah SD Pandemi. Saya adalah siswa kelas lima. Saya akan menceritakan tentang profesi yang dapat saya temukan di sekolah saya. Ada kepala sekolah, guru, pustakawan, staf sekolah, dan tukang kebun Kepala sekolah adalah orang yang memimpin sekolah. Guru adalah orang yang mengajar siswa. Pustakawan adalah orang yang bekerja di perpustakaan. Staf sekolah adalah orang yang mengurus administrasi sekolah dan tukang kebun adalah orang yang mengurus taman sekolah.

Penjelasan:

Jadikan jawabanku tercerdas ya dekk, tks
